decks.notes: This Golgari Garden control deck focuses on resource management and removal, utilizing cards like Deadly Dispute, Defile, and Crypt Rats to control the board. The deck also includes sacrifice and graveyard recursion cards like Fanatical Offering and Witch's Cottage to maintain card advantage and board presence. The inclusion of Tithing Blade and Troll of Khazad-d√ªm provides additional ways to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Ichor Wellspring and Lembas help maintain card advantage. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through smart plays and efficient removal.

The main focus of this deck is to efficiently cycle through cards, generate mana through rituals, and then cast a high number of spells in a single turn to trigger powerful combo effects, such as Reaping the Graves. Utilizing low-cost cycling creatures like Drannith Stinger and efficient rituals like Cabal Ritual allows for explosive turns that can overwhelm opponents. The inclusion of cards like Architects of Will and Dihada's Ploy help control the opponent's deck while setting up the combo. The deck is designed to quickly assemble its pieces and win through a massive graveyard recursion chain.

The main theme of this deck is focused on controlling the game through the use of gates and countermagic spells. Utilizing a variety of creatures and spells to maintain board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy, this deck aims to gain incremental advantage and eventually overwhelm the opponent. By combining powerful control elements with the versatile Gates archetype, this deck is able to adapt to different matchups and outmaneuver the opponent in order to secure victory.

This Pauper 1 vs 1 deck is focused on a combo strategy known as Poison Storm. The deck includes cards that can generate poison counters quickly, while also maintaining card advantage and mana acceleration. The key idea is to overwhelm the opponent with poison counters before they can establish a strong board presence. The deck combines cards that can proliferate poison counters with others that can draw cards and provide mana ramp. Overall, the strategy revolves around efficiently building up poison counters and controlling the game tempo until victory.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control through the use of Gates and Inspector creatures, while also utilizing removal spells like Cast Down and Snuff Out to handle threats. The deck also includes a few key cards like Troll of Khazad-d√ªm and Thorn of the Black Rose for added value. The inclusion of Lembas and Orzhov Guildgate provides additional support for the deck's overall strategy. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of resilient creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact and disruption spells like Prismatic Strands to help maintain control of the game.
